meanings.definition: To create or produce something together with others.
meanings.sent1: We are cocreating a story for our school play.
meanings.sent2: The team is cocreating a new marketing campaign.
meanings.sent3: The friends were cocreating a delicious recipe for dinner.
meanings.sent4: The artists cocreating a masterpiece on the canvas.
meanings.sent5: The students were cocreating a colorful mural for the school wall.

meanings.definition: The act of collaborating with others to bring something into existence.
meanings.sent1: Cocreating with classmates can lead to amazing projects.
meanings.sent2: The cocreating of a successful business requires teamwork.
meanings.sent3: The cocreating of a surprise party was kept secret from the guest of honor.
meanings.sent4: The cocreating of a beautiful garden brought the community together.
meanings.sent5: The cocreating of a charity event raised funds for a good cause.
